successes.title: Memoto Lifelogging Camera - presented by Narrative
successes.description: A tiny, automatic camera and app that gives you a searchable and shareable photographic memory. Born Memoto, now Narrative Clip.

Pledges.description: MEMOTO CURIOUS • Receive updates from this project and sponsor environment-friendly recycling of one Memoto camera.
ECO FRIENDLY • Receive updates from this project and sponsor environment-friendly recycling of five Memoto cameras.

YOU ARE AWESOME • Receive one awesome Memoto T-shirt in your choice of size and get featured on the list of Memoto Friends at memoto.com. UPDATE: Add $35 to any other pledge to get this reward as well.

EARLY BIRD SPECIAL • At $80 off of list price, be the first to get a Memoto camera in your choice of color. Choose between Arctic White, Graphite Gray and Memoto Orange PLUS get featured on the list of Memoto Friends at memoto.com.
BRING ON THE SECOND BATCH • March (2nd batch) delivery at $30 off of list price of one Memoto camera in your choice of color between Arctic White, Graphite Gray and Memoto Orange.
SHOOTING FOR THE STARS • April (3rd batch) delivery of one Memoto camera in your choice of color between Arctic White, Graphite Gray and Memoto Orange.

CREATIVE GENIUS • We'll fly you to Stockholm to participate in a three days workshop brainstorming with our entire team on what lifelogging gadgetry Memoto should develop next. Hotel and all meals included. Add your choice of pledge from above to get the gear as well.
